pullrequest.title: [issue #2487] Fix manipulating links in the model editor

content.raw: A full integration test which selects each entity and manipulates it would be ideal, but that would take more time than I can spend on this right now. Instead, I wrote some tests which check the underlying assumptions regarding visual depth. I'm still not sure what changed that caused the issue, but if one of the depths changes in the future, we would catch that with the new tests. Does that sound ok? 217ea5a
